name: SKYLAND - A Visual Novel
description:
Zack is a popular guy that moves with his mom to SkyLand City. There, trying to make new friends and get a new beginning, He will meet Samantha. A lonely girl that have a big dream after her terrible experience in High School. Trying to find himself again, Zack is going to realize that he was more LOST than he thought he was, and will also discover, that he can't find his own path... all by himself.

SkyLand is an exciting Visual Novel that will lead you straight to a fast and fun story, with exciting characters and a great story experience.

WARNING: The Game may contain strong language. 
The Game may have grammatical errors because my original language isn't English, and I'm still learning.

STAY AT HOME!
